name: Cheat Day (itch)
description:
Hi there! 

My name is Ghost Cloud!

Cheat Day is about eating candy and avoiding superfoods! Finally. Now you can eat all the candy you want and not have to worry about gaining weight! I made just about everything with the help of the Godot game engine, and since you want a link to the main theme for the game, here you go!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTgYKJgaAMQ

So this is my first and (so far) only game. I have been putting a few hours here and there into it for a couple really busy months, but as I have been learning more about making games, I decided it would be best to wrap this one up and start on a new game to learn a bigger variety of things. Of course, I used the Dodge The Creeps demo game as a launching pad for this game since it is where I started learning!

I really am so proud to actually have finished a game. It might not be much, but it's honest work. 

Feel free to support me however you can if you'd like so I can continue making these little projects. I feel like I would be over the moon just to make a single dollar from this game, so that's my goal! One dollar :)

Here is a link to the Godot license:

https://godotengine.org/license
